channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Mariah Carey, Anderson .Paak Perform ‘Play This Song’ on ‘Fallon’
item.description: 🔥 Mariah Carey and Anderson .Paak are bringing the heat on 'Fallon' with their performance of 'Play This Song'! 🔥 #MusicMagic

item.title: Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl Halftime Show Will Make History for Being Entirely in Spanish
item.description: 🎉 Bad Bunny about to make Super Bowl halftime history with an all-Spanish show! 🇵🇷 Let’s get ready to dance! 💃 #BadBunny #SuperBowlHalftime

item.title: Taylor Swift Breaks Her Own Spotify Record for Most Album Pre-Saves
item.description: 🎉 Taylor Swift is smashing records again! 🚀 Her new album has the most pre-saves ever on Spotify! 🎶🔥 #TaylorSwift #RecordBreaker

item.title: Super Furry Animals Announce 2026 Reunion Tour, First Trek in a Decade
item.description: Wild news! Super Furry Animals are hitting the road in 2026 for their first tour in 10 years 🎉🎸 Let's get ready to party! #SuperFurryAnimals #ReunionTour

item.title: Doja Cat Announces 2026 World Tour
item.description: 🎉 Let's travel the world with @DojaCat in 2026! 🌍 Who's joining us? #DojaCatWorldTour2026 🔥
